Title: Hosting InfoPath FormControl inside WPF Application
Description: Here is a basic sample to host an InfoPath form inside of Windows Presentation Foundation.  This sample shows how to use the WindowsFormsHost to embed the Microsoft.Office.InfoPath.FormControl in a WPF application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Here is a basic sample to host an InfoPath form inside of Windows Presentation Foundation. This sample shows how to use the WindowsFormsHost to embed the Microsoft.Office.InfoPath.FormControl in a WPF application.
